node.bodyHTML:
Hey, I just made a Pull Request!

  • Fixes regression where alerts classes are no longer exposed due to restructuring of utils/types files
  • Updates getProductInsights in the API to expect a lastBillingDate param as a follow up to #3054, to account for billing data delays

‚úîÔ∏è Checklist

  • A changeset describing the change and affected packages. (more info)
  • Added or updated documentation
  • Tests for new functionality and regression tests for bug fixes
  • Screenshots attached (for UI changes)
node.title: [cost-insights] Export alerts utils

node.bodyHTML: Can't use relative links to code in docs. Quick fix for now but should add this to the link verification script üòÖ
node.title: docs/api: fix link in utility APIs

node.bodyHTML:
Also de-emphasised the tags a bit.

Before:

After:
node.title: catalog: make the table denser
workflows: fix changeset release script naming
plugins/sonarqube: bump to 0.1.1

node.bodyHTML: Fixing issues in #2654
node.title: workflows: run prettier as part of changeset versioning
TechDocs: Remove mkdocs-techdocs-core from the mono repo
README: add notice to update git remote
rewrite other references to spotify/backstage and sorrounding things
rewrite repo location urls
Update CODEOWNERS to fit new org

node.bodyHTML:
added option to set custom SAML postMessage origin URL.

Context: Setting appUrl to localhost in docker container will restrict external traffic. Setting it to 0.0.0.0 will cause postMessage origin not match.

‚úîÔ∏è Checklist

  • A changeset describing the change and affected packages. (more info)
  • Added or updated documentation
  • Tests for new functionality and regression tests for bug fixes
  • Screenshots attached (for UI changes)
node.title: SAML origin url option

node.bodyHTML:
Bumps pg from 8.3.0 to 8.4.2.

Changelog

Sourced from pg's changelog.

All major and minor releases are briefly explained below.

For richer information consult the commit log on github with referenced pull requests.

We do not include break-fix version release in this file.

pg@8.4.0

  • Switch to optional peer dependencies & remove semver package which has been a small thorn in the side of a few users.
  • Export DatabaseError from pg-protocol.
  • Add support for ssl-mode in the connection string.
Commits
  • b6d69d5 Publish
  • 80c500f Update packages/pg-pool/index.js
  • e82137e Tests
  • fd2c356 Security: simplify defineProperty non-enumerables
  • 36342c9 Publish
  • d8681fc Comments & cleanup
  • dd3ce61 Fixes based on postgres maintainer advice
  • d31486f Change when sync is sent during pipelining
  • b45051d Update comments
  • f55d879 Apply fix
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting @dependabot rebase.

Dependabot commands and options

You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR:

  • @dependabot rebase will rebase this PR
  • @dependabot recreate will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it
  • @dependabot merge will merge this PR after your CI passes on it
  • @dependabot squash and merge will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it
  • @dependabot cancel merge will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging
  • @dependabot reopen will reopen this PR if it is closed
  • @dependabot close will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually
  • @dependabot ignore this major version will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)
  • @dependabot ignore this minor version will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

Hey, I just made a Pull Request!

Updates to the documentation site, including,

  • Remove some extraneous (older?) footers that said, "Back to docs"
  • Remove period from a header
  • Add a link to info on semlas where the delicious pastry is new to foreigners ( üòã ü•Æ üç¥ ) (should multiple semlas be semlor??)
  • Fix minor typo
